title: Extra: The Abortion Issue in Presidential Elections
itunes:title: Extra: The Abortion Issue in Presidential Elections
description:
Kevin continues the conversation with Emily Miller, Republican strategist and former Communications Director for House Majority Whip, and Josh Galper, co-founder and partner of public relations firm Trident DMG and the law firm Davis, Goldberg & Galper. They discussed abortion and the importance to voters in presidential elections.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
